title: [K-12] Social Learning-Based EdTech Integration Education for Professionals in Their 40s

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and basic domain knowledge in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: A social interaction learning model applying VR simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can complete real-time collaborative projects with peers on social learning platforms at an 80%+ completion rate.
Learners successfully implement social problem-solving scenarios in VR-based simulation environments for specialized fields (medicine/law/technology) at least three times.

Learners post three edtech tool usage experiences on Padlet or Google Classroom via mobile devices (smartphone/tablet) within two weeks, provide feedback to at least two peers, and revise/share back at least one received feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
